title: NYC Taxi Data EDA
description: 232R Group Project - Exploratory Data Analysis on NYC Taxi dataset using Python and Jupyter Notebooks. Analyzed trip patterns, fare distributions, and spatial-temporal trends in NYC taxi operations.

title: NYC Taxi Plotly Dash Dashboard
description: Interactive visualization dashboard for NYC taxi data built with Plotly Dash and Python. Provides real-time insights and interactive charts for exploring taxi trip data patterns.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: Modern portfolio website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features dark mode, dynamic project loading from JSON, GitHub API integration, and responsive design. Deployed on GitHub Pages.

title: Voice-to-Slide Generator
description: AI-powered TypeScript application that converts voice input into presentation slides. Uses natural language processing to generate structured slide content from spoken presentations.

title: Visual Memory Search
description: JavaScript-based visual search application with memory functionality. Interactive tool for searching and remembering visual patterns and content.

title: Universal Knowledge Graph Builder
description: Buildathon project - TypeScript application for constructing universal knowledge graphs. Enables automated relationship mapping and knowledge base creation.

title: EE Pulse Monitoring System
description: Buildathon project - TypeScript application for monitoring electrical engineering pulse signals and system health metrics in real-time.

title: Codebase Time Machine
description: TypeScript tool for traversing and analyzing codebase history. Enables developers to visualize code evolution and track changes over time.

title: Natural Language MongoDB Agent
description: HTML/JavaScript application that enables natural language queries to MongoDB databases. Converts plain English questions into MongoDB queries using AI.

title: Stock Data Analysis
description: Jupyter Notebook project for comprehensive stock market data analysis. Includes trend analysis, pattern recognition, and predictive modeling for financial data.

title: DSC207R Data Science Project
description: Graduate-level data science course project. Comprehensive analysis and machine learning implementations for advanced data science applications.

title: ipBundler - IP Release Manager
description: IP Release Manager/Bundler for managing file and directory contents in semiconductor design. Python-based tool for organizing and bundling IP deliverables across multiple technology nodes.
